Using I20070313-1051, I found this log in my error view.

java.lang.NullPointerException

at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

I get it each time I close or open a project.
I checked out one project and its plugin classpath container was not initialized properly.

Moving to PDE because in this case it is the PDE state that is in trouble.
Still CC'ing Tom because the problem may still be in the state itself.

A host supplier may be null.

Moving to Tom's bucket.

This is an issue with the resolver devmode used by PDE.  When in devmode we
attempt to resolve the constrants of a fragment bundle when no host exists for
the fragment bundle.  This causes the host to be null which leads to the NPE. 
The resolver should do a null check on the host in this case.
Fix has been released in HEAD.

I confirm that taking HEAD I can get my workspace in a workable state.
Thanks.
